attr.title: TINAMP
attr.desc:
TINAMP - This Is Not A Music player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts files of audio book folders alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible.
attr.desc_md:
TINAMP - **T**his **I**s **N**ot **A** **M**usic player is an audio book player application meant to play DRM free audio books.
It remembers listening positions, sorts files of audio book folders alpha numerically, supports different play speeds, has a sleep timer and equalizer presets.
It features a simplistic 16x4 ASCII character UI that adapts to fill the screen as much as possible.
attr.inst:
Install the application and place your audio books either inside the applications ports folder by creating a folder audiobooks or in the following relative positions to the ports application directory: ../../audiobooks (usually the roms folder in Rocknix, KNULLI, ArkOS, AmberELEC), ../../ROMS/audiobooks (usually the ROMS folder in MuOS)

Inside the audiobooks folder one folder equals one audio book containing all the files of this audio book. The folder name is used as the name of the audio book inside the application.
attr.inst_md:
Install the application and place your audio books either inside the applications ports folder by creating a folder audiobooks or in the following relative positions to the ports application directory: ../../audiobooks (usually the roms folder in Rocknix, KNULLI, ArkOS, AmberELEC), ../../ROMS/audiobooks (usually the ROMS folder in MuOS)

Inside the audiobooks folder one folder equals one audio book containing all the files of this audio book. The folder name is used as the name of the audio book inside the application.
